One of my most favourite games of all time! This is an instant favorite of mine from all the Valve titles, it's hard for me to do this brilliant game justice with a simple review, but oh my this game was fantastic, I was a bit late to play it, like I am with many Valve games. If your interested in a swell, and challenging puzzle game with memorable characters, amazing and pleasent design, along with fun gameplay, I advocate you to go pick it up and give it a play, and recommend it to any of your friends!

PROS:
 - Thinking with Portals
 - Amazing story
 - Immersive Multiplayer
 - Stunning visuals
 - Workshop chamber creation is the greatest thing ever in a Source game

CONS:
 - Some areas/test chambers leave you blank
 - Way too Story driven

OVERVIEW:
     Portal 2 is an example of taking a game and buffing it up to perfection. I've never seen a sequal so enhanced and great. Fucking beautiful visuals, Detailed Multiplayer, and a great Story, you don't need no damn review to make your choice on buying this game. But incase you like getting to know your games before you play them, well here's my review. Portal 2 continues some huge ass time distance in the future. Aperature Science is completely destroyed and useless. You still play Chell, who is undeniably, one of the most boring Valve characters, but I won't go into depth with that. Gameplay has remained the same, except for the fact that they've added a new mechanic called Gels! There are different kinds of Gels to allow you to do different things in your world. New chamber mechanics have also been added, but are not that important to mention. The Multiplayer in this game is an entirely co-operative game, another Story if you will. But it's easy way of communicating with the player without having to use a mic is very very satisfying. The Workshop Custom Chambers work differently. Normally in a Source game, you'd have to download Source SDK, create your mod/map/CSGO skin, then publish it like that. In Portal 2, Valve did something different. The map maker is in the game, AND ITS FUCKING AMAZING AND EASY TO USE. ANYBODY can make a custom chamber, ANYBODY! My only concerns with this game is that the Story is way too Story-driven. I played the first Portal with pure enjoyment because it was mostly quiet and easy to think in. Yeah, there was a story and dialoge. But since it didn't have as much dialoge as Portal 2, the game became quiet very easily and made it more of a thinking ground, which helped a lot. In Portal 2, everybody is speaking everywhere, and it can get very annoying when trying to focus on a chamber.

Overall, this game is a damn good game and you should already have it in your library and installed.
I LOVE THIS GAME. It is the best game I have played ever. Amazing story . Amazing art . Amazing characters . Amazing game buy this NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

[b]Does Portal 2 live up to my expectations?[/b]

Well, the first [i]Portal[/i] was a challenging logic puzzle game, with lotsa sarcasm and irony on top. I enjoyed the game very much, but personally didn't (in general) like some of the faster paced reaction bits or having to place Portals while upside down and backwards (though they weren't going to hard on that). [i]Portal[/i] had about 70% logic and 30% reaction puzzles aka [i]Test Chambers[/i]. Only downturn was, that the (intentionally) grey and sterile environment kept the girls away from playing.

So, this game adds some Cockney speaking companion, has the old fun bits, remains solid in the core and adds really wonderful new gimmicks. All of them are lovely, but the [i]Gels[/i] "stick" out for me, because they open up incredible possibilities. Apart from the gels, the game is in general more colourful than its predecessor since the story after the end of [i]Portal[/i] allows that. 
Now it is about 80-90% logic puzzles which are [b]not[/b] just recycled old ideas. To the contrary, the game hasn't really maxed out the sheer endless options and this is there the community comes in.
This is about one of the biggest games ever, since there are hundreds of free community test chambers to download and easily to integrate which makes the game extremely valuable - not only on sale!
Sadly, there are more of these factory/outdoor debris maps, where most effort remains simply looking for the portable surface. 
The icing on the cake is the Co-Op Multiplayer, which should be really part of any good workplace team building effort. This hypes the game to a complete new level. [i]Portal 2[/i] reassures the community that [i]Valve[/i] stands for witty quality games.
Highly recommend this game; don't see anything worse compared to [i]Portal[/i] and most of it better. You don't need to play the first part, but it helps to enjoy some comments even the better.

Portal 2 is an interactive piece of art. It will be remembered in the future has one of the best games ever made by our generation not only for its great mechanics, great story with deep characters, great voice acting, great humor, great visual effects and great music but also for its entertainment and unlimited playability based on a solid and competent modding community. 
On top of that, Portal 2 is also an exercise of flexibility to your mind.The game requires you to think against the laws of physics but, at the same time, you end to do it naturally. Physically speaking, everything that happens in this game is impossible and, at the same time, plausible.
Maybe one of the best puzzle games on Earth! And the story is also the best!

Geiles Spiel!!!
Also bevor ich mir das Spiel gekauft habe war ich skeptisch, ich dachte an langweilige schwarz-weiße Testräume die halt nur etwas knobelei enthalten. Aber dann habe ich eine empfehlung von einem Freund der mich gut kennt erhalten. "Das Spiel wird dir gefallen" sagte er und so kaufte ich mir Portal 2. Und zu meinem Erstaunen fing das Spiel nicht damit an, dass man in einem öden Raum ist und mit einer Portalkanone das andere Ende erreichen musste, sondern in einem Hotelzimmer. Um nicht zu spoilern was genau vorkommt sag ich es mal so ES GIBT EINE STORY. Und die Story hat so manche Überraschende Wendung. Man wird sogar Emotional mitgerissen.
Das Spiel ist allen die etwas Geduld und Spaß an kleinen Knobeleien haben zu empfehlen. Das auf jeden Fall. Aber auch allen die eine Richtig gute Story haben wollen, von Characteren emotional beeinflusst werden wollen und somanchen Richtungswechsel interressiert.
Semplicemente spettacolare! Me ne avevano parlato molto bene, ma ero un po' dubbioso. Coinvolgente e divertente con un finale memorabile.
Simplistic, you make a portal to get from A to B, yet theres something weirdly entertaining there, Some quite impressive, puzzling levels, Loved it :D

amazing game that i would recommend to any game aficionado of any age. a mostly story driven game with many challenging puzzles. side note; if you ever want free time or a life outside of a computer, you may want to by this slightly less then the average person.

Ich liebe dieses Spiel! Nach dem ersten Teil konnte ich mir nun endlich den lang ersehnten zweiten kaufen, weil ich etwas Geld übrig hatte. Die Story ist lustig, die Charaktere sind vielfältig und abwechslungsreich. Das Gameplay natürlich macht ein Portal Spiel aus, welches in diesem Male wieder schön umgesetzt wurde mit neuen Features wie Gelen oder Gravitationsstrahlen etc.
Der einzige Nachteil ist die Spielzeit. ich hatte das Spiel schon nach sechs Stunden durch. Ich hoffe, dass ein Nachfolger kommt, denn diese Reihe verdient es wirklich. Sollte ich dieses Spiel nun bewerten würde ich neun von zehn Punkten geben, denn obwohl das Spiel schön an die Story des ersten Teils anknüpft und man durch lustige Dialoge wirklich gut unterhalten wird, ist es leider einfach zu kurz. Dennoch kann man es nur höchstens empfehlen.

Portal 2 is a mind blowing game, seriously. The concept of the game is really well thought, and is amazing. Portal 2 is a puzzle based game with tons of potential. It's story line continues off from portal's story line. (Another game) Portal 2 also has a lots of new themes added to it, as apposed to where in portal the theme was just clean. Another huge thing added to portal 2 is Coopertive mode, where two robots named Atlas and P-Body help eachother slove lots of new puzzles. If you want to find out more of what portal 2 has to offer, get the game to see for yourself.

Просто отличная игра. Она из тех, что либо захватывают с первого раза, либо вызывают головокружение и человек не может играть. Лучшая из всех пространственных головоломок, что мне приходилось пробовать. Темп прохождения не вызывает раздражения от необходимости куда-то спешить. Отдельно порадовал конструктор. Тем, кто еще не пробовал, пробовать рекомендую обязательно. Первая часть тоже великолепна!

Buen juego. Han aprovechado bastante bien las propiedades del motor y han disimulado bastante bien las continuas e incesantes cargas de pantalla. Muy bueno el editor de niveles y muy bien pensados los puzzles cooperativos. Historia muy chula con un sorprendente final. Como cualquier juego, contiene bugs como el fallo de los campos de emancipación natural al pasar un objeto agachado. En general muy bueno, se nota que lo ha hecho Valve.

传送门的续作（似乎有点小剧透）  故事继续主角在实验室的历程   6小时左右的游戏剧情  给玩家带来了一个封闭故事的最后却又不失想像的空间   而在故事的最后  玩家终于登上回到地表的电梯  配乐转折为清新的曲调  之后打开门所看到的场景更是与之前封闭的游戏感觉形成极大的冲突  给人心灵上的震撼  不愧为神作    双人合作又不失卖队友的乐趣  创意工坊也为这款游戏提供了更加长久的寿命  值得一试
